comment: Main content area containing Chinese characters in traditional vertical layout, including small seal script (篆书) and explanatory text in regular script (楷书). The text is arranged in columns from right to left, typical of classical Chinese texts. Contains entries for characters like '彊', '弜', '弦', '豎', etc., with definitions, phonetic notes, and etymological explanations. Includes annotations such as '文二 重三' and '臣鉉等曰'. Marginalia includes page number '大十五' and section marker '兑文十二下'.
